channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:

item.title: Broken and uneven pathway, 8th May
item.description:
Outside 49 shearwater grove, very uneven pathway, growth growing up pushing the tarmac up, trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shearwater Grove, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 8th May
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X4 1 METER BARRIERS AND X4 SANDBAGS PLACE AROUND DAMAGED CATV COVER TO MAKE SAFE (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees and vegatation need cutting back, 8th May
item.description:
Trees and foliage need cutting back as are too tall, encroaching onto housing and over parking spaces into Laxton Road. Foliage and vegetation needs cutting back as largely overgrown. Hasn't been addressed in many years and needs maintainance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Laxton Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep potholes, 8th May
item.description:
There are a number of deep potholes in the road. I nearly crashed my cycle after hitting one, so they are dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Wellington Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 8th May
item.description:

item.title: 6 areas scrapped off pavement tarmac outside 8 hearne close, 8th May
item.description:
Council digger has scrapped off 6 areas of tarmac while digging out hedge at front of 8 hearne close. It's awful, looks awful is difficult to walk on and sweep. Please please can the be repaired

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Hearne Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping on pavement Swindon Road, 8th May
item.description:
This is between St Paul’s St North and St Paul’s Lane, unfortunately a regular flytipping location. Current lot is a clear plastic box, cardboard and a bag of rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Saint Pauls Street North, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Mini roundabout, Parton road, station road…outside Churchdown parish offices…several potholes ongoing, the road painters have painted white lines in the potholes this morning causing traffic to stop in dismay. Raised iron works and rutted surface causing traffic to swerve., 8th May
item.description:
Entrance to Churchdown parish council car park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
